00020 #ifndef BOOST_TOKENIZER_POLICY_JRB070303_HPP_
00021 #define BOOST_TOKENIZER_POLICY_JRB070303_HPP_
00022 
00023 #include<boost/iterator/iterator_adaptor.hpp>
00024 #include<boost/iterator/detail/minimum_category.hpp>
00025 #include<boost/token_functions.hpp>
00026 #include<utility>
00027 #include<cassert>
00028 
00029 
00030 namespace boost
00031 {
00032   template <class TokenizerFunc, class Iterator, class Type>
00033   class token_iterator
00034       : public iterator_facade<
00035             token_iterator<TokenizerFunc, Iterator, Type>
00036           , Type
00037           , typename detail::minimum_category<
00038                 forward_traversal_tag
00039               , typename iterator_traversal<Iterator>::type
00040             >::type 
00041           , const Type&
00042         >
00043   {
00044 
00045       friend class iterator_core_access;
00046 
00047       TokenizerFunc f_;
00048       Iterator begin_;
00049       Iterator end_;
00050       bool valid_;
00051       Type tok_;
00052 
00053       void increment(){
00054           assert(valid_);
00055           valid_ = f_(begin_,end_,tok_);
00056       }
00057 
00058       const Type&  dereference() const {
00059           assert(valid_);
00060           return tok_;
00061       }
00062       template<class Other>
00063       bool equal(const Other& a) const{
00064           return (a.valid_ && valid_)
00065               ?( (a.begin_==begin_) && (a.end_ == end_) )
00066               :(a.valid_==valid_);
00067 
00068       }
00069 
00070       void initialize(){
00071           if(valid_) return;
00072           f_.reset();
00073           valid_ = (begin_ != end_)?
00074               f_(begin_,end_,tok_):false;
00075       }
00076   public:
00077       token_iterator():begin_(),end_(),valid_(false),tok_() { }
00078 
00079       token_iterator(TokenizerFunc f, Iterator begin, Iterator e = Iterator())
00080           : f_(f),begin_(begin),end_(e),valid_(false),tok_(){ initialize(); }
00081 
00082       token_iterator(Iterator begin, Iterator e = Iterator())
00083             : f_(),begin_(begin),end_(e),valid_(false),tok_() {initialize();}
00084 
00085       template<class OtherIter>
00086       token_iterator(
00087             token_iterator<TokenizerFunc, OtherIter,Type> const& t
00088             , typename enable_if_convertible<OtherIter, Iterator>::type* = 0)
00089             : f_(t.tokenizer_function()),begin_(t.base())
00090             ,end_(t.end()),valid_(t.at_end()),tok_(t.current_token()) {}
00091 
00092       Iterator base()const{return begin_;}
00093 
00094       Iterator end()const{return end_;};
00095 
00096       TokenizerFunc tokenizer_function()const{return f_;}
00097 
00098       Type current_token()const{return tok_;}
00099 
00100       bool at_end()const{return valid_;}
00101 
00102 
00103 
00104 
00105   };
00106     template <
00107         class TokenizerFunc = char_delimiters_separator<char>, 
00108         class Iterator = std::string::const_iterator,
00109         class Type = std::string
00110     >
00111     class token_iterator_generator {
00112 
00113     private: 
00114     public:
00115         typedef token_iterator<TokenizerFunc,Iterator,Type> type;
00116     };
00117     
00118     
00119     // Type has to be first because it needs to be explicitly specified
00120     // because there is no way the function can deduce it.
00121     template<class Type, class Iterator, class TokenizerFunc>
00122         typename token_iterator_generator<TokenizerFunc,Iterator,Type>::type 
00123     make_token_iterator(Iterator begin, Iterator end,const TokenizerFunc& fun){
00124         typedef typename 
00125             token_iterator_generator<TokenizerFunc,Iterator,Type>::type ret_type;
00126         return ret_type(fun,begin,end);
00127     }
00128 
00129 } // namespace boost
00130 
00131 #endif
